The relevant provisions of LAW read as follows :

“ When the creation , modification or cessation of a person ’s personal or property rights depends on a fact and the document which certifies the existence of such fact has disappeared or has been lost and can not be reissued or obtained in any other way , the interested party shall be entitled to request certification of such fact by a court decision . ”
